GSD.description:
platform/x86/intel: Fix pmt_crashlog array reference

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.6 by commit 69347776e2764121cc04ffbbcb7796864fbdc14d. For more details please see the references link.
